item.title: Zandrin
item.description: Zandrin is our 4th gen HB from Nugget x Loko. He has amazing yellows with blue bars and some vibrant red highlights on his turrets and spine. He is a phenomenal Ambilobe Panther Chameleon. Zandrin Zandrin1 Zandrin2 Zandrin3 Zandrin4 Zandrin5 Zandrin6 Zandrin7 Zandrin8 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Nugget Dam Loko 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Zandrin (F4-CG14) Generation 1 1. Zandrin (F4-CG14). Zandrin was born on 2021-06-04 at iPardalis. He is the son of Nugget (F3-CG4) and Loko (F5-CG13).

item.title: Noko
item.description: Noko is our HB female from Nugget and Loko. Her brother is Zandrin. She should throw some intense yellow and blue with some interesting red highlighting. Her personality is very calm and photogenic. It was incredibly easy to get some nice profile pictures of her! Noko Noko1 Noko2 Noko3 Noko4 Noko5 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Nugget Dam Loko 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Noko (F4-CG14) Generation 1 1. Noko (F4-CG14).

item.title: Nugget x Loko
item.description: This pairing was between our third generation hold back, Nugget, and our gorgeous Ambilobe female from Chromatic Chameleons, Loko. Loko is from a great pairing between Kromatisk and Wet Dream - a ybbb x ybbb Ambilobe combination. Nugget is the HB male from our Jude x Kako clutch. His yellows are my favorite from the third generation. This was a great combination with our favorite third gen yellow male with an extremely high quality yellow female!

item.title: Loko
item.description: Loko is a premium CB Ambilobe from some of the best lines in the USA. Her sire, Kromatisk from Chromatic Chameleons, is one of my favorite active breeders of the locale. My hope is that we can get some little guys that glow yellow from her and Nugget! Loko Loko1 Loko2 Filial Group F5 Sire Kromatisk Dam Jackie 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Loko Generation 1 1. Loko. Loko was born on 2020-04-18 at Chromatic Chameleons.
